wikipedia_page.main: Charles Hardinge Drage (* 29 March 1897; † 31 July 1983) was a British naval officer, secret agent and author.

response: Drage was the son of Dr Charles Drage (1825–1922) of Hatfield in Hertfordshire. He was educated at Eton and at Christ Church, Oxford, where he graduated in 1883, before pursuing further studies in European universities including Berlin and Moscow.
